messages.content: system_message
Write a query to get all persons email
SELECT email FROM person;
system_message
Give me all people from person table
SELECT * FROM person;
system_message
Give me 5 name and email from person
SELECT name, email FROM person LIMIT 5;
system_message
Give me 4 name and email from person where contry England
SELECT name, email FROM person WHERE address.country = 'England' LIMIT 4;
system_message
Provide 4 ratings, including the person's name and product name from reviews
SELECT rating, person.name, product.name AS product_name FROM review LIMIT 4;
system_message
Retrieve all orders with status 'pending'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE order_status = 'pending';
system_message
Fetch all products in the 'Women' category with price below 100 USD
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Women' AND price < 100;
system_message
Retrieve all reviews containing the keyword 'impressed'
SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_text CONTAINS 'impressed';
system_message
Retrieve all sellers with their website URLs
SELECT name, website.main, website.docs, website.store FROM seller;
system_message
Write a query to get all products in the 'Men' category
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Men';
system_message
Get all products with price greater than 50 USD
SELECT * FROM product WHERE price > 50;
system_message
List all reviews with a rating of 5
SELECT * FROM review WHERE rating = 5;
system_message
Fetch all orders placed in March 2023
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time::format(time.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') >= '2022-12-30' AND time::format(time.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') < '2023-04-01';
system_message
Get the total number of products in each category
SELECT category, count() AS total_products FROM product GROUP BY category;
system_message
Retrieve the top 5 most expensive products
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
system_message
Get all products with stock greater than 100
SELECT * FROM product WHERE stock > 100;
system_message
List all users who have placed more than 5 orders
SELECT * FROM person WHERE (SELECT count() FROM order WHERE in = person.id) > 5;
system_message
Retrieve all reviews with rating 4 and above
SELECT * FROM review WHERE rating >= 4;
system_message
Get the names and emails of sellers in Germany
SELECT name, email FROM seller WHERE addresses.country = 'Germany';
system_message
Fetch all orders placed by a specific person with id 'person:123'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE in = 'person:123';
system_message
List all products in the 'Men' category sorted by price descending
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Men' ORDER BY price DESC;
system_message
Retrieve the average rating for each product
SELECT product_id, math::mean(rating) AS average_rating FROM review GROUP BY product_id;
system_message
Get all payment details for a person with id 'person:456'
SELECT * FROM payment_details WHERE person = 'person:456';
system_message
List all monthly sales for January 2023
SELECT * FROM monthly_sales WHERE month = '2023-01';
system_message
Fetch all address history entries for a person with id 'person:789'
SELECT * FROM address_history WHERE person = 'person:789';
system_message
Get all sellers with the website 'https://example.com'
SELECT name, email FROM seller WHERE website.main = 'https://example.com';
system_message
List all products in the 'Smartphones' sub_category
SELECT * FROM product WHERE sub_category = 'Smartphones';
system_message
Retrieve products with price between 50 and 150 USD
SELECT * FROM product WHERE price >= 50 AND price <= 150;
system_message
Fetch all orders shipped between '2023-01-01' and '2023-03-31'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time.shipped_at >= '2023-01-01' AND time.shipped_at <= '2023-03-31';
system_message
Get all persons living in the city 'New York'
SELECT * FROM person WHERE address.city = 'New York';
system_message
Retrieve all products that are available in the color 'Red' and size 'M'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE 'Red' IN colours AND 'M' IN sizes;
system_message
List all orders with a total amount greater than 500 USD
SELECT * FROM order WHERE price * quantity > 500;
system_message
Get the latest update time for each product
SELECT id, time.updated_at FROM product;
system_message
Get all reviews for the product with id 'product:456'
SELECT * FROM review WHERE out = 'product:456';
system_message
Fetch all orders with payment method 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE payment_method ~ 'Credit Card';
system_message
Retrieve products with names containing the keyword 'Pro'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE name CONTAINS 'Pro';
system_message
Fetch the currency used in each monthly sale record
SELECT month, currency FROM monthly_sales;
system_message
Retrieve all reviews created in March 2023
SELECT * FROM review WHERE time::format(time.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') >= '2023-03-01' AND time::format(time.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') < '2023-04-01';
system_message
Get the total sales from order grouped by currency
SELECT currency, math::sum(price * quantity) AS total_sales FROM order GROUP BY currency;
system_message
Fetch the average number of reviews per product
SELECT math::mean(avg_review) AS avg_reviews FROM avg_product_review GROUP BY avg_reviews;
system_message
List all products that have both the color 'Blue' and size 'L'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE 'Blue' IN colours AND 'L' IN sizes;
system_message
Retrieve the creation date of each seller
SELECT name, time.created_at FROM seller;
system_message
Get all orders that have not been shipped yet
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time.shipped_at IS NONE;
system_message
Fetch all products with a price exactly 99 USD
SELECT * FROM product WHERE price = 99;
system_message
List all sellers located in 'France'
SELECT * FROM seller WHERE addresses.registered_address.country ~ 'France';
system_message
Retrieve all orders with the status 'shipped'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE order_status = 'shipped';
system_message
Find all products in the 'Kids' category priced under 50 USD
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Kids' AND price < 50;
system_message
Retrieve all sellers located in 'Italy'
SELECT * FROM seller WHERE addresses.registered_address.country ~ 'Italy';
system_message
Get the total number of orders for each order_status
SELECT order_status, count() AS total_orders FROM order GROUP BY order_status;
system_message
List all products with a size of 'XL' and color 'Black'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE 'XL' IN sizes AND 'Black' IN colours;
system_message
Fetch all reviews for products in the 'Electronics' category
SELECT * FROM review WHERE ->product.category ?= 'Electronics';
system_message
Retrieve all persons who have a company_name specified
SELECT * FROM person WHERE company_name IS NOT NONE;
system_message
Get all orders processed before '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time.processed_at < '2023-01-01';
system_message
Find the average price of products in the 'Electronics' category
SELECT math::mean(price) AS avg_price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' GROUP ALL;
system_message
List all persons with email ending in '@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM person WHERE email ~ '@gmail.com';
system_message
Fetch all orders with quantity greater than 10
SELECT * FROM order WHERE quantity > 10;
system_message
Retrieve the details of the product with id 'product:789'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id = 'product:789';
system_message
Get the top 3 sellers based on the number of products they have
SELECT seller, count() AS product_count FROM product GROUP BY seller ORDER BY product_count DESC LIMIT 3;
system_message
List all payment methods used in orders
array::distinct(SELECT payment_method FROM order);
system_message
Fetch all reviews with highlights in the review_text field
SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_text CONTAINS 'your_highlight_term';
system_message
Retrieve the sum of sales for each currency in monthly_sales
SELECT currency, math::sum(sum_sales) AS total_sales FROM monthly_sales GROUP BY currency;
system_message
Find all products where 'Green' is in colours and 'S' is in sizes
SELECT * FROM product WHERE 'Green' IN colours AND 'S' IN sizes;
system_message
Get all orders that have been shipped but not processed
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time.shipped_at IS NOT NONE AND time.processed_at IS NONE;
system_message
List all reviews made by a person with id 'person:789'
SELECT * FROM review WHERE in = 'person:789';
system_message
Retrieve all seller emails where the main website is 'https://store.example.com'
SELECT email FROM seller WHERE website.main = 'https://store.example.com';
system_message
List all persons whose age is over 30
SELECT * FROM person WHERE age > 30;
system_message
Get the names of all products supplied by 'supplier:123'
SELECT name FROM product WHERE supplier = 'supplier:123';
system_message
Retrieve all reviews with more than 100 likes
SELECT * FROM review WHERE likes > 100;
system_message
Fetch all products categorized under 'Accessories'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Accessories';
system_message
Get all orders placed in the last 24 hours
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time.created_at >= time::now() - 1d;
system_message
Retrieve the email addresses of all sellers with a rating above 4.5
SELECT email FROM seller WHERE rating > 4.5;
system_message
Fetch all reviews where the review_text contains 'excellent service'
SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_text CONTAINS 'excellent service';
system_message
Get the total number of orders each seller has fulfilled
SELECT out.seller as seller, count() AS orders_fulfilled FROM order GROUP BY seller;
system_message
Retrieve all products with a price less than 10
SELECT * FROM product WHERE price < 10;
system_message
List all persons who have made a purchase in the 'Electronics' category
SELECT array::distinct(<-person) AS person_id FROM order WHERE ->product.category ?= 'Electronics';
system_message
Fetch all products that have received a rating of 1 star
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id IN (SELECT VALUE out FROM review WHERE rating = 1);
system_message
Get all sellers who have been inactive for over a year
SELECT * FROM seller WHERE time.updated_at < time::now() - 1y;
system_message
Fetch all reviews with a response from the seller
SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_text IS NOT NONE;
system_message
Get all persons who have items in their wishlist
SELECT array::distinct(in) AS person_id FROM wishlist GROUP ALL;
system_message
Retrieve products that have images available
SELECT * FROM product WHERE array::len(images) > 0;
system_message
Fetch all reviews made in the last year with a 5-star rating
SELECT * FROM review WHERE rating = 5 AND time.created_at >= time::now() - 1y;
system_message
Get the total revenue generated by each product
SELECT out AS product_id, math::sum(price * quantity) AS total_revenue FROM order GROUP BY product_id;
system_message
Fetch all reviews that mention 'customer support'
SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_text CONTAINS 'customer support';
system_message
Fetch all orders delivered to the city 'New York'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE shipping_address.city = 'New York';
system_message
Get names and emails of persons who have made more than 5 orders
SELECT * FROM (SELECT in.name AS person_name, in.email AS person_email, count() AS order_count FROM order GROUP BY person_name, person_email) WHERE order_count > 5;
system_message
List all persons who haven't made any orders
SELECT * FROM person WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT array::distinct(in) FROM order GROUP ALL);
system_message
Get the most recent 10 orders placed
SELECT * FROM order ORDER BY time.created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
system_message
Retrieve all products with 'wireless' in their details
SELECT * FROM product WHERE 'wireless' INSIDE details;
system_message
Fetch the average price of products per category
SELECT category, math::mean(price) AS avg_price FROM product GROUP BY category;
system_message
Get all products that have been reviewed by a person with id 'person:123'
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id IN (SELECT VALUE out FROM review WHERE in = 'person:123');
system_message
Retrieve all orders with a total amount over 500 USD
SELECT * FROM order WHERE price * quantity > 500;
system_message
Get the total number of products in each sub_category
SELECT sub_category, count() AS product_count FROM product GROUP BY sub_category;
system_message
Retrieve all reviews with comments longer than 200 characters
SELECT * FROM review WHERE string::len(review_text) > 200;
system_message
Get all persons who have updated their email in the last month
SELECT * FROM person WHERE time.updated_at >= time::now() - 30d;
system_message
Retrieve the total number of reviews per rating level
SELECT rating, count() AS review_count FROM review GROUP BY rating;
system_message
List all sellers who have products in the 'Home Appliances' category
SELECT seller FROM product WHERE category = 'Home Appliances' GROUP BY seller;
system_message
Fetch the average quantity per order for each product
SELECT out AS product_id, math::mean(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM order GROUP BY product_id;
system_message
Retrieve all products that are currently out of stock
SELECT * FROM product WHERE stock = 0;
system_message
List all orders with a delivery date in the next week
SELECT * FROM order WHERE time.delivery_date >= time::now() AND time.delivery_date <= time::now() + 7d;
system_message
Get all persons who have updated their email in the last month
SELECT * FROM person WHERE time.updated_at >= time::now() - 30d;
system_message
Retrieve the total number of reviews per rating level
SELECT rating, count() AS review_count FROM review GROUP BY rating;
system_message
List all sellers who have products in the 'Home Appliances' category
SELECT seller FROM product WHERE category = 'Home Appliances' GROUP BY seller;
system_message
Fetch the average quantity per order for each product
SELECT out AS product_id, math::mean(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM order GROUP BY product_id;
system_message
Retrieve all products where the category is 'electronics' (case insensitive).
SELECT * FROM product WHERE string::lowercase(category) = 'electronics';
system_message
List all persons whose email domain is '@example.com', case insensitive.
SELECT * FROM person WHERE string::lowercase(email) ~ '@example.com';
system_message
Get all reviews containing the keyword 'excellent' regardless of case.
SELECT * FROM review WHERE string::lowercase(review_text) CONTAINS 'excellent';
system_message
Find all orders where the payment method is 'credit card', ignoring case.
SELECT * FROM order WHERE string::lowercase(payment_method) = 'credit card';
system_message
Retrieve all products with a rating of 5 stars
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id IN (SELECT VALUE out FROM review WHERE rating = 5);
system_message
List the names and emails of all sellers with products in the 'Electronics' category
SELECT name, email FROM seller WHERE id IN (SELECT VALUE seller FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics');
system_message
Get all orders where the quantity ordered is less than 5
SELECT * FROM order WHERE quantity < 5;
system_message
Fetch all products that have sizes 'M' or 'L' available
SELECT * FROM product WHERE 'M' IN sizes OR 'L' IN sizes;
system_message
Retrieve the total revenue per seller
SELECT out.seller AS seller_id, math::sum(price * quantity) AS total_revenue FROM order GROUP BY seller_id;
system_message
List all persons who have left a review in the last month
SELECT array::distinct(in) AS person_ids FROM review WHERE time.created_at >= time::now() - 30d GROUP ALL;
system_message
Find all sellers with 'store' in their website URL
SELECT * FROM seller WHERE website.store CONTAINS 'store';
system_message
Fetch all products with images available
SELECT * FROM product WHERE array::len(images) > 0;
system_message
Retrieve all products with 'Smartphone' in their name
SELECT * FROM product WHERE name CONTAINS 'Smartphone';
system_message
Get the total number of orders for each product
SELECT out AS product_id, count() AS order_count FROM order GROUP BY product_id;
system_message
List all persons who have items in their cart
SELECT array::distinct(in) AS person_ids FROM cart GROUP ALL;
system_message
Fetch all products that are associated with SKUs
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id IN array::distinct(SELECT VALUE in FROM product_sku);
system_message
Retrieve all sellers who have updated their details in the last week
SELECT * FROM seller WHERE time.updated_at >= time::now() - 7d;
system_message
Get all products using the details_embedding index
SELECT * FROM product WITH INDEX idx_product_details_embedding;
system_message
List all orders with order_status not inside 'processed' or 'shipped'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE order_status NOTINSIDE ['processed', 'shipped'];
system_message
Retrieve all reviews where the review_text is not empty
SELECT * FROM review WHERE string::len(review_text) > 0;
system_message
Get all orders that have been 'processed' but not 'shipped'
SELECT * FROM order WHERE order_status = 'processed' AND time.shipped_at IS NONE;
system_message
List all products with price converted from GBP to USD using fn::pound_to_usd
SELECT *, fn::pound_to_usd(price) AS price_usd FROM product WHERE currency = 'GBP';
system_message
Retrieve all products that are currently out of stock
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id IN (SELECT VALUE in FROM product_sku WHERE quantity = 0);
system_message
Fetch the average quantity per order for each product
SELECT out AS product_id, math::mean(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM order GROUP BY product_id;
